data.eml:eml: Five new records and morphological data of polyclad species (Platyhelminthes: Turbellaria) from Rio Grande do Norte, Northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bahia, Juliana, Padula, Vinicius, Delgado, Marlon (2012): Five new records and morphological data of polyclad species (Platyhelminthes: Turbellaria) from Rio Grande do Norte, Northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3170: 31-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212293
